title.value: The temperature regime of the air environment for growing and fattening of meat productivity pigs
Температурный режим воздушной среды при выращивании и откорме свиней мясного направления продуктивности

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Malikov, I.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: During the experiment, lead in conditions of a trial-manufacture pork farm, belonging SO ZhodinoAgroPlemEhlita in Smolevichskij district, are studied zoohygienic (temperature-humidity mode and gas structure of room air) and zootechnical (alive weight, gain of alive weight and safety of experimental animals, forage conversion) parameters. In experiments on young pigs of Yorkshire+Landrace crossbred combination optimum parameters of indoor air were established: at the age of 35-40 days – 25-27oC, at the age of 41-86 days – 21-24oC, at the age of 86-140 days – 19-23oC, over 140 days of age – 20-21oC. Creating a comfortable and favorable management environment allowed to increase the average daily weight gain of young pigs at rearing by 12 g, at fattening – 24 g, safety – by 2.5 p.p., decrease feed costs by 3,4-6,2%
